segments.text: I'm really fixated on that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just looks so unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched quite far to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One false move and he's definitely going to tumble backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm holding my breath just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can he not feel it wobbling underneath him?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems oblivious to the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on getting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash if it were to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is making me very anxious to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The situation is very tense in that corner of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely absorbed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've ever done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
